resources.string:
The description of The Weather App
 • The Weather App for Android is your best option for getting accurate weather information. 
 • Make confident decisions, whether you are planning for the day.
 • The entire week, We’ve improved the app so that it runs faster.


FAST INTUITIVE WEATHER FORECASTS:
 • Small Download: Don’t waste storage space on your phone with a huge weather app
 • Improved Speed: Get the weather information you need faster than ever before.
 • Beautiful Design: Navigate the app quickly and smoothly with clean interfaces designed for Android devices.
 • Intuitive Forecast Graphs: Know weather for the next hour, to the next 3 days, with new and improved weather forecast graphs.


 KNOW THE WEATHER ANYWHERE, RIGHT NOW
 •Weather Map: Fast-loading radar map allows you to quickly see any precipitation in your area, including rain, sleet, and snow.
 • Current Conditions: See “feels like” temperature, heat index, wind speed, and more.
 • Forecasts: Hourly, daily, weekly, weather forecasts.
 • Track and read detailed weather information from multiple locations around the world.


About Us
 • We are key-soft team. 
 • Build weather app. We are four member.
 • Team leader S____
